scripts.db:start: npm run db:start:mysql && npm run db:start:pg
scripts.db:start:mysql: docker run -d -p 13306:3306 -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=test -e MYSQL_DATABASE=test -e MYSQL_USER=test -e MYSQL_PASSWORD=test --name my_mssql mysql:8.0.31
scripts.db:start:pg: docker run -d -p 15432:5432 -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=postgres -e POSTGRES_DB=postgres --name my_pg postgres
scripts.db:stop:mssql: docker stop my_mssql && docker rm my_mssql
scripts.db:stop:mysql: docker stop my_mysql && docker rm my_mysql
scripts.db:stop:pg: docker stop my_pg && docker rm my_pg
scripts.db:stop: npm run stop:mysql && npm run stop:pg && npm run stop:mssql
scripts.init: npm run init:pg & npm run init:mysql
scripts.benchmark: npm run drizzle && npm run orange && npm run prisma && npm run mikro
scripts.drizzle: npm run drizzle:mysql && npm run drizzle:pg && npm run drizzle:sqlite
scripts.drizzle:sqlite: npm run drizzle:pool1:sqlite && npm run drizzle:pool10:sqlite
scripts.drizzle:mysql: npm run drizzle:pool1:mysql && npm run drizzle:pool10:mysql
scripts.drizzle:pg: npm run drizzle:pool1:pg && npm run drizzle:pool10:pg
scripts.drizzle:pool1:sqlite: npm run init:sqlite && cross-env POOLSIZE=1 tsx ./src/drizzle/benchmark-sqlite.ts
scripts.drizzle:pool10:sqlite: npm run init:sqlite && cross-env POOLSIZE=10 tsx ./src/drizzle/benchmark-sqlite.ts
scripts.drizzle:pool1:mysql: npm run init:mysql && cross-env POOLSIZE=1 tsx ./src/drizzle/benchmark-mysql.ts
scripts.drizzle:pool10:mysql: npm run init:mysql && cross-env POOLSIZE=10 tsx ./src/drizzle/benchmark-mysql.ts
scripts.drizzle:pool1:pg: npm run init:pg && cross-env POOLSIZE=1 tsx ./src/drizzle/benchmark-pg.ts
scripts.drizzle:pool10:pg: npm run init:pg && cross-env POOLSIZE=10 tsx ./src/drizzle/benchmark-pg.ts
scripts.orange: npm run orange:mysql && npm run orange:pg && npm run orange:sqlite
scripts.orange:sqlite: npm run orange:pool1:sqlite && npm run orange:pool10:sqlite
scripts.orange:mssql: npm run orange:pool1:mssql && npm run orange:pool10:mssql
scripts.orange:mysql: npm run orange:pool1:mysql && npm run orange:pool10:mysql
scripts.orange:pg: npm run orange:pool1:pg && npm run orange:pool10:pg
scripts.orange:pool1:mssql: npm run init:mssql && cross-env POOLSIZE=1 tsx ./src/orange/benchmark-mssql.ts
scripts.orange:pool10:mssql: npm run init:mssql && cross-env POOLSIZE=10 tsx ./src/orange/benchmark-mssql.ts
scripts.orange:pool1:sqlite: npm run init:sqlite && cross-env POOLSIZE=1 tsx ./src/orange/benchmark-sqlite.ts
scripts.orange:pool10:sqlite: npm run init:sqlite && cross-env POOLSIZE=10 tsx ./src/orange/benchmark-sqlite.ts
scripts.orange:pool1:mysql: npm run init:mysql && cross-env POOLSIZE=1 tsx ./src/orange/benchmark-mysql.ts
scripts.orange:pool10:mysql: npm run init:mysql && cross-env POOLSIZE=10 tsx ./src/orange/benchmark-mysql.ts
scripts.orange:pool1:pg: npm run init:pg && cross-env POOLSIZE=1 tsx ./src/orange/benchmark-pg.ts
scripts.orange:pool10:pg: npm run init:pg && cross-env POOLSIZE=10 tsx ./src/orange/benchmark-pg.ts
scripts.prisma: npm run prisma:mysql && npm run prisma:pg && npm run prisma:sqlite
scripts.prisma:mssql: npm run init:mssql && prisma generate --schema=./src/prisma/schema-mssql.prisma && cross-env POOLSIZE=1 tsx ./src/prisma/benchmark-mssql.ts && cross-env POOLSIZE=10 tsx ./src/prisma/benchmark-mssql.ts
scripts.prisma:sqlite: npm run init:sqlite && prisma generate --schema=./src/prisma/schema-sqlite.prisma && cross-env POOLSIZE=1 tsx ./src/prisma/benchmark-sqlite.ts && cross-env POOLSIZE=10 tsx ./src/prisma/benchmark-sqlite.ts
scripts.prisma:mysql: npm run init:mysql && prisma generate --schema=./src/prisma/schema-mysql.prisma && cross-env POOLSIZE=1 tsx ./src/prisma/benchmark-mysql.ts && cross-env POOLSIZE=10 tsx ./src/prisma/benchmark-mysql.ts
scripts.prisma:pg: npm run init:pg && prisma generate --schema=./src/prisma/schema-pg.prisma && cross-env POOLSIZE=1 tsx ./src/prisma/benchmark-pg.ts && cross-env POOLSIZE=10 tsx ./src/prisma/benchmark-pg.ts
scripts.prisma:pool1:mssql: npm run init:mssql && prisma generate --schema=./src/prisma/schema-mssql.prisma && cross-env POOLSIZE=1 tsx ./src/prisma/benchmark-mssql.ts
scripts.prisma:pool10:mssql: npm run init:mssql && prisma generate --schema=./src/prisma/schema-mssql.prisma && cross-env POOLSIZE=10 tsx ./src/prisma/benchmark-mssql.ts
scripts.prisma:pool1:sqlite: npm run init:sqlite && prisma generate --schema=./src/prisma/schema-sqlite.prisma && cross-env POOLSIZE=1 tsx ./src/prisma/benchmark-sqlite.ts
scripts.prisma:pool10:sqlite: npm run init:sqlite && prisma generate --schema=./src/prisma/schema-sqlite.prisma && cross-env POOLSIZE=10 tsx ./src/prisma/benchmark-sqlite.ts
scripts.prisma:pool1:mysql: npm run init:mysql && prisma generate --schema=./src/prisma/schema-mysql.prisma && cross-env POOLSIZE=1 tsx ./src/prisma/benchmark-mysql.ts
scripts.prisma:pool10:mysql: npm run init:mysql && prisma generate --schema=./src/prisma/schema-mysql.prisma && cross-env POOLSIZE=10 tsx ./src/prisma/benchmark-mysql.ts
scripts.prisma:pool1:pg: npm run init:pg && prisma generate --schema=./src/prisma/schema-pg.prisma && cross-env POOLSIZE=1 tsx ./src/prisma/benchmark-pg.ts
scripts.prisma:pool10:pg: npm run init:pg && prisma generate --schema=./src/prisma/schema-pg.prisma && cross-env POOLSIZE=10 tsx ./src/prisma/benchmark-pg.ts
scripts.mikro: npm run mikro:mysql && npm run mikro:pg && npm run mikro:sqlite && npm run mikro:mssql
scripts.mikro:mssql: npm run mikro:pool1:mssql && npm run mikro:pool10:mssql
scripts.mikro:sqlite: npm run mikro:pool1:sqlite && npm run mikro:pool10:sqlite
scripts.mikro:mysql: npm run mikro:pool1:mysql && npm run mikro:pool10:mysql
scripts.mikro:pg: npm run mikro:pool1:pg && npm run mikro:pool10:pg
scripts.mikro:pool1:mssql: npm run init:mssql && cross-env POOLSIZE=1 tsx ./src/mikro/benchmark-mssql.ts
scripts.mikro:pool10:mssql: npm run init:mssql && cross-env POOLSIZE=10 tsx ./src/mikro/benchmark-mssql.ts
scripts.mikro:pool1:sqlite: npm run init:sqlite && cross-env POOLSIZE=1 tsx ./src/mikro/benchmark-sqlite.ts
scripts.mikro:pool10:sqlite: npm run init:sqlite && cross-env POOLSIZE=10 tsx ./src/mikro/benchmark-sqlite.ts
scripts.mikro:pool1:mysql: npm run init:mysql && cross-env POOLSIZE=1 tsx ./src/mikro/benchmark-mysql.ts
scripts.mikro:pool10:mysql: npm run init:mysql && cross-env POOLSIZE=10 tsx ./src/mikro/benchmark-mysql.ts
scripts.mikro:pool1:pg: npm run init:pg && cross-env POOLSIZE=1 tsx ./src/mikro/benchmark-pg.ts
scripts.mikro:pool10:pg: npm run init:pg && cross-env POOLSIZE=10 tsx ./src/mikro/benchmark-pg.ts
